title: School360
description: A mobile app for students and teachers to manage their attendances
fullDescription: This was my first ever mobile app made with React Native and Expo Go. The app allows students to view their attendance records, while teachers can see everyones daily attendance data. The app connects to a Supabase backend for data storage and retrieval, and uses React-Query for efficient data fetching and state management. Form validation is handled using Yup to ensure data integrity. This was a group project that i made with 3 other students from Artveldehogeschool.
features: Role-based Access for Students and Teachers

title: AVSWebshop
description: This is my PHP project for my exam at Artevelde Hogeschool.
fullDescription: This Laravel PHP project is a webshop that I developed for my exam at Artevelde Hogeschool. The webshop features product listings, a shopping cart, and an order management system. Users can browse products, add them to their cart, and proceed to checkout. The admin panel allows for managing products, categories, tags and orders.

title: Grand Library
description: This is my first next.js project where I learned the basics of Next.js and React.
fullDescription: This project is a grand library application. In this exercise, I learned the basics of Next.js and React. The app allows users to view a collection of books, with detailed pages for each book. Theres also a wishlist feature and a lending system. There are also Staff features only for librarians to manage the book inventory, and user management.
features: Login as Student, Staff or as a Guest User
Library of Books with Detail Pages

title: Niche Community
description: A test app to learn PHP and the BaseMVC model.
fullDescription: This project is a niche community application. in this excercise I learned the basics of PHP and the BaseMVC model. The app allows users to view a list of characters from the Star Wars Universe, with detailed pages for each character. It also includes a search filter to easily find characters by name.

title: Sea Life Quiz
description: An interactive quiz application with admin panel
fullDescription: This project is an interactive quiz application that tests users' knowledge about sealife. It includes an admin panel for managing quizzes, questions, answers & images. It also has a periodic data export to excel. This project was for my exam project at Artevelde Hogeschool.

title: My Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio showcasing my projects and skills.
fullDescription: This project is my personal portfolio website, designed to showcase my skills, projects, and experience. It features a modern design, responsive layout, and interactive elements to engage visitors.

title: Best Of 2024
description: A class project focused on work environment and new CSS/JS skills.
fullDescription: This project was developed as part of my coursework, focusing on creating a modern web application using the latest CSS techniques and JavaScript features. The project demonstrates responsive design principles, modern CSS Grid and Flexbox layouts, and interactive JavaScript functionality.

title: STAM Museum
description: A responsive website for the STAM museum in Ghent, focused on styling.
fullDescription: A responsive website created for the STAM museum in Ghent, Belgium. This project emphasizes modern web design principles, accessibility, and mobile-first responsive design approach.
